name: ReAction Ecosystem
body:
## Welcome to ReAction Ecosystem Overview
The ReAction Ecosystem provides an overview and entry point into the internal solutions being developed by Casual Networks.

## Disclaimer
The solutions within ReAction Ecosystem described within are closed-source projects. At this time Casual Networks is working directly with a core group companies as we evaluate our platform, services, and supporting libraries.

### Continued Interest?
Casual Networks has granted some Enterprise Companies an early access licence, this is often under the context of a development/research partnership, or similar agreement.

* Solution Architect
* Similar Platform Level Stakeholder
  * Enterprise Architect
  * SoA Engineer

### Seeking Research Partners
Casual Networks continues to establish dialog with companies/individuals interested in the following areas: 

* Service Component Architecture and Runtime - Ruby
* Multi-Agent Systems(MAS)
* Intelligent Agents (Software)
* Distributed Coordination
* Context Aware Finite State Machine/Automata
* Abstract State Machines
* Machine Learning, Context, Ontology, Semantics, or Self-Healing

###Contact
If you fit the categories outlined above, please email support@casualnetworks.com with basic information along with an identified interest, and someone from the Casual Networks team will contact you.

***

## Ecosystem

** Pending review migration from internal wiki, last updated 04/10/2012.
note: Don't delete this file! It's used internally to help with page regeneration.
